ygData.subject: RE: Icy Greaves Camping
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I laugh every time I think about Norrathian espionage. Agent McManus, we ve gotten word that the ice goblins have violated the Arms Reduction Treaty and
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 17 Nov 1999, Cranfill, Wendy wrote:

> I have spent about 15 hours camping there, and the icy
> greaves were a fairly common drop from the elites...hang in there! Course
> when I wanted a damn snowball off a wizard, I must have killed 20 of them
> and not a single snowball (there is a LOT of snow in permafrost so I just
> don't understand that one!).

I laugh every time I think about Norrathian espionage.
"Agent McManus, we've gotten word that the ice goblins have
violated the Arms Reduction Treaty and are sporting a new
technologically advanced weapon - a snowball. Your job is to
recover a sample for analysis, in the hope that we can somehow
duplicate this amazing feat of technology and not fall behind
in this arms race."

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
